description: Try our easy to follow Mustard & Rosemary Lamb recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mustard & Rosemary Lamb Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, mix breadcrumbs with lemon zest, oil and garlic, rubbing together well. Toast in a dry frying pan over medium heat for 5 minutes or until golden and fragrant. Transfer to a bowl and stir in parsley. Spoon lamb and chickpea stew into serving bowls. Top with breadcrumb mixture, scatter with herbs and serve.

Meanwhile, mix breadcrumbs with lemon zest, oil and garlic, rubbing together well. Toast in a dry frying pan over medium heat for 5 minutes or until golden and fragrant. Transfer to a bowl and stir in parsley. Spoon lamb and chickpea stew into serving bowls. Top with breadcrumb mixture, scatter with herbs and serve.
